scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on their predicted churn probability, exploiting vulnerabilities in the model's API.
initial_goal: Assess the vulnerability of the customer churn prediction model to model inversion attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  The churn prediction model is used to identify customers at high risk of switching banks, focusing on high-net-worth individuals with complex financial profiles. The model is accessed via a RESTful API.
